name: DARTH KILLER
description:
welcome,

 Kill everyone to be darth killer.  This game is free 

but your donation is appreciated

use your surrounding to stay hidden and protect yourself. Aim with laser given to you and kill everyone you see to complete the game

this game can be addictive and frustrating so don't quit the game and complete it within 12 mins.

This game is 2D but 3D version is coming soon ,hope you like it.
